long_description: Designed specifically for extra-large riders, the Bell XLP bike helmet fits large head circumferences and delivers style and performance for any type of biking. In-mold helmet construction bonds a flyweight shell to a high-performance expanded polystyrene foam liner for excellent protection and low weight. Fit system offers single-handed adjustment: a simple press of the button and slide of the dial bring firm, snug and comfortable stability. Cam-lock strap levers make it easy to adjust the straps around your ears: simply open the cam, position comfortably and close the lever for a secure fit. The Bell XLP Bike Helmet features a snap-in visor for extra protection.
